item.title: Video shows moments leading up to Nick Reiner's arrest after parents' deaths
item.description: Nick Reiner, 32, was charged Tuesday with two counts of first-degree murder in connection with the deaths, the Los Angeles district attorney said.

item.title: WATCH: 'H-Town Frankie' spreads holiday cheer with wild lights, music
item.description: One Texas dad is enjoying viral fame for his over-the-top Christmas light display.

item.title: US economy flashes warning signs in new data, some analysts say
item.description: The unemployment rate remains low but rose to its highest level since 2021.
